param.name: output.changebars
param.desc: Show change bars based on Oxygen changes

param.name: change.tracking.user.fg.color
param.desc: Change tracking foreground colors for Oxygen users, specified as a plain color (i.e. red, yellow, blue), or with a hexadecimal equivalent (i.e. #FFFFFF). The default value is 'royalblue orange orchid teal violet'.

param.name: change.tracking.insert.decoration
param.desc: Text decoration for insert, specified as CSS notation. The default value is 'text-decoration:underline;'.

param.name: change.tracking.delete.decoration
param.desc: Text decoration for delete, specified as CSS notation. The default value is 'text-decoration:line-through no-underline;'.

param.name: change.tracking.comment.bg.color
param.desc: Comment background colors for Oxygen tracked changes, specified as a plain color (i.e. red, yellow, blue), or with a hexadecimal equivalent (i.e. #FFFFFF). The default value is 'royalblue orange orchid teal violet' (The same as change.tracking.user.fg.color).

param.name: change.tracking.comment.bg.color.opacity.base
param.desc: Comment background color opacity base value for Oxygen tracked changes, specified as real number less than 1. The default value is '0.15'.

param.name: change.tracking.comment.bg.color.opacity.ratio
param.desc: Comment background color opacity ratio value for Oxygen tracked changes, specified as real number less than 1. The default value is '0.15'.

param.name: change.tracking.annotation.type

param.name: change.tracking.delete.annotation.color
